title: Slobodan Topalović
text:
Slobodan Topalović (8 November 1952 – May 1994) was a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28football%29">Goalkeeper</a>.
He is considered to be one of <a href="Olympique%20Lyonnais">Olympique Lyonnais</a> best ever goalkeepers and has been named the best ever Yugoslavian to ever associate with the club. His son was also a professional footballer who played in Iran, Kazakhstan, Serbia and is now a goal keeping coach for <a href="Emirates%20Club">Emirates Club</a>.
Slobodan played in <a href="West%20Germany">West Germany</a>, before having a stint of two years with <a href="OFK%20Belgrade">OFK Belgrade</a>. He then ended his career with <a href="Olympique%20Lyonnais">Olympique Lyonnais</a>.
